snippet.title: Witherbloom - Pre-Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
The Gods provided everything - now they are gone. With one of 16 multi-class combos, plunder divine realms for resources, allies, and answers. Overcome twisted aberrations and surreal environments with 1-4 players in exciting survival-ARPG gameplay. Rebuild a shattered world... if you can survive.

Meet us at PAX East on March 21st 2024 to try the demo for yourself!

Wishlist us on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2838030/Witherbloom

Join Us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/bmFqfjh8UX
